IDBObjectStoreAutoIncrement.summary:
The autoIncrement read-only property of the
interface returns the value of the auto increment flag
for this object store.

remarks.para: Note that every object store has its own separate auto increment counter.

IDBObjectStoreAutoIncrement.value:
A boolean value:
ValueMeaning
trueThe object store auto increments.
falseThe object store does not auto increment.
